title: Border, 1835
description: Wide band of foliage and flowers, continuously clustered. Two varieties of blue tulip, white daisies, other white and yellow flowers on brownish-red flocked ground shaded with black. Between green edging lines: at bottom, wide green band with yellow border lines and continuous black stencil pattern of leaves and flowers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1835.
1835. Block-printed on handmade paper. Gift of Josephine Howell, Inc.. 1959-160-71-a/e.
